content: That's really helpful, thanks! I think I'll try to check out The Getaway Café and The Coffee Lab for breakfast, and then grab lunch at Tahoe City Sol or The Dam Café. And maybe I'll even meetup with some fellow hikers at Tahoe Mountain Brewing Company or The River Grill. Do you have any recommendations for accommodations in the area? I'm looking for something relatively affordable and close to the trailheads.
